entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [UITests] Legacy iOS tests currently not producing results on main #17945
    .NET 8 GA
  • The current activity cannot be detected #17944
  • Blazor Hybrid app - database no longer works on Android in Release mode after RC1 #17943
  • When a Shape (Line, Path, etc) changes size, the layout size does not change, so the Shape gets clipped #17942
  • Maui Splash Screen will not update on iOS App #17940
  • Off color Switch bar #17939
  • Label FormattedString not reacting to AppThemeBinding change at runtime #17938
    .NET 8 GA
  • Localization rendering issue when language is right to left [iOS] #17934
  • Android: FileNotFoundException only in Release-Mode when using System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo.GetVersionInfo(...) #17932
  • SkiaSharp signature check fails for deployment (Visual Studio local iOS device) #17930
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] Recipe splash screen logo missing on iOS #17925
  • [MAUI] SplashScreen resize=false failed to work on iOS. #17924
  • Selecting a link in a WebView on iOS causes a NSInternalInconsistencyException #17923
  • AppTheme behaving incorrectly in flyout menu #17922

Closed

  • [Android] When a user taps off of an input control the keyboard no longer closes #12002
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Memory Leak issue in ListView #16450
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Issues with Upgrading Firebase Authentication Package and Xamarin.AndroidX.Browser in .NET MAUI #17935
  • EmbeddedReferenceJar has no equivalent in MAUI #17826
  • Nested Border objects do not layout their Bounds correctly based on expected settings (iOS/Android/Windows) #17763
  • Issue when Publish a Mac Catalyst app for distribution outside the Mac App Store #17820

PullRequests

Created

  • Update README.md #17941
    community ✨
  • Revert new packaged names for macios dependencies for .NET 8. #17933
  • Enable more legacy tests #17931
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Removes freeze using SecureStorage #17928
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Keep textcolor on characterspacing #17926
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR1

Merged

  • Make sure to not call new APIs on old iOS #17907
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 8 GA
  • Dev/scoban/getridofxamuit #17849
    area/testing

Updated

  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • Merge net8 to main #17906
  • [net8.0] Update to rtm versions #17904
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [testing] Run tests on device #17808
    area/testing
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Limit star expansion when measuring/arranging at constrained sizes #17880
    area/layout 🔲, .NET 8 SR1
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] Fix wrong gray color using transparent in iOS gradients #17696
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 SR1
  • [MacCatalyst] Implement PointerPressed and PointerReleased #16925
    area/gestures, .NET 8 SR1
  • [C] Lowest specificity for propagated values #17648
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17773
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 8 SR1
  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
